name: Space'O Ship - The Legend of Space
name_original: Space'O Ship - The Legend of Space
description:
The exciting adventure of the legendary spaceship, named "Heartship" in the depths of space!

Hello! My dev-nickname its tixonochek. Its my first good project. I hope you like it.

PRO TIP:SPACE = SHOTLEFT CLICK - MOVE [HOLDING: ALWAYS MOVE TOWARDS CURSOR]SCROLL CLICK = ROCKET (20$) Please, write comment. I respect any tips and suggestions. Its VERY big help for developing.
